mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum no, t.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM connected_lesson c INNER JOIN membership m ON(c.student = m.user_no) INNER JOIN find_lesson f ON(c.lesson_no = f.lesson_no) WHERE teacher = #{userNo} AND is_connected = 0 ORDER BY c.conn_lesson_no ) t ORDER BY no ) x WHERE no between #{paging.startNo} AND #{paging.endNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE connected_lesson SET is_connected = 1 WHERE conn_lesson_no = #{connNo}
mapper.select: SELECT f.max_people, f.lesson_no FROM connected_lesson c INNER JOIN find_lesson f ON(c.lesson_no = f.lesson_no) WHERE c.conn_lesson_no = #{connNo}
